homepage.title: Welcome to ManzelHelp
homepage.description: A friendly place where users can offer and request services like housekeeping, tutoring, pet care, and more. Connect, help, and grow together!
homepage.requestServicePlaceholder: Coming soon: Post your service needs
homepage.jobsOfferedDescription: Discover exciting job opportunities posted by customers in your area
homepage.noJobsAvailable: No jobs available at the moment
homepage.noJobsAvailableDescription: Check back soon for amazing opportunities from our customers!
homepage.why2: Offer your skills and earn extra income

fieldDescriptions.phone: Add your phone number for contact purposes
fieldDescriptions.address: Add your address for service delivery

Footer.aboutDescription: ManzelHelp connects people who need services with those who can provide them. Our mission is to make help accessible, friendly, and secure for everyone.

taskerProfile.title: Tasker Profile
taskerProfile.subtitle: Build your professional profile to attract more clients

completion.title: Complete Your Tasker Profile
completion.description: Complete your profile to start receiving job requests and build trust with clients.

personal.description: Update your basic information and professional photo
personal.avatarDescription: Upload a professional photo to build trust with clients
personal.emailNote: Contact support to change your email address

bio.description: Tell clients about your experience and expertise
bio.bioPlaceholder: Describe your skills, experience, and what makes you great at what you do...
bio.bioHint: Share your background, specialties, and why clients should choose you
bio.serviceRadiusHint: How far are you willing to travel for jobs?

skills.description: Manage the services you offer to clients
skills.noServicesDescription: Add services to start receiving job requests from clients

availability.description: Set your weekly availability for new jobs
availability.quickBookingDescription: Clients can instantly book you during your available hours for faster jobs

verification.description: Verify your identity to build trust and unlock all features
verification.identityDescription: Upload a government-issued ID to verify your identity and start offering services
verification.acceptedDocuments: Accepted: Driver's License, Passport, National ID Card
verification.benefit1: Unlock all tasker features and job applications
verification.benefit2: Build trust with clients through verified status

postJob.title: Post a Job
postJob.subtitle: Describe what you need and find the perfect helper

stepDescriptions.jobDetails: Tell us about the job you need done

jobDetails.title: Job Title
jobDetails.titlePlaceholder: e.g., Need house cleaning for 3-bedroom apartment
jobDetails.descriptionPlaceholder: Describe what needs to be done, any specific requirements, and what's included...
jobDetails.requirementsPlaceholder: Any special instructions, materials needed, or specific requirements...
jobDetails.imagesDescription: Upload photos to help taskers understand the job better

scheduleBudget.durationPlaceholder: How long do you think this will take?
scheduleBudget.budgetPlaceholder: What's your budget for this job?
scheduleBudget.maxApplicationsDescription: How many tasker applications do you want to receive?

review.title: Review Your Job Post
review.description: Please review all details before publishing your job

success.jobPostedDescription: Your job has been published and taskers can now apply.

errors.maxApplicationsGreaterThanZero: Maximum applications must be greater than 0
errors.notLoggedIn: Please log in to post a job
errors.taskersCannotPost: Taskers cannot post jobs. Please switch to customer account.

tips.title: Tips for a Great Job Post
tips.tip1: Be specific about what you need and any requirements
tips.tip2: Include photos to help taskers understand the job better
tips.tip3: Set a realistic budget based on market rates
tips.tip4: Be flexible with timing to get more applications

applications.title: Job Applications
applications.subtitle: Review applications from taskers for your job
applications.noApplicationsDescription: Taskers haven't applied to your job yet. Your job is live and visible to qualified taskers.

confirmations.acceptDescription: Are you sure you want to accept this application? This will assign the tasker to your job and notify them.
confirmations.rejectDescription: Are you sure you want to reject this application? The tasker will be notified and won't be able to apply again.

errors.unauthorized: You don't have permission to view these applications

myJobs.title: My Jobs
myJobs.subtitle: Manage your posted jobs and applications
myJobs.pageDescription: Here you can view, create, and manage all the job posts you've made as a customer. Keep track of applications and manage your ongoing projects with taskers.
myJobs.step1: Click Post New Job to create a new job post.
myJobs.step3: Assign the best tasker for your job.
myJobs.step4: Track progress and manage completed work.
myJobs.noJobsDescription: You haven't posted any jobs. Start by creating your first job post to find the perfect tasker!
myJobs.errorDescription: There was an error loading your jobs. Please try refreshing the page.
myJobs.pleaseLogin: Please log in to view your jobs.

errors.unauthorized: You don't have permission to view these jobs

postService.title: Create Service Offer
postService.subtitle: Showcase your skills and attract customers

stepDescriptions.pricing: Set your pricing and service details

basicInfo.title: Service Title
basicInfo.descriptionPlaceholder: Describe what you offer, your experience, and what makes you special...
basicInfo.serviceAreaPlaceholder: Describe the areas you cover or any location preferences

pricing.durationPlaceholder: How long does this service typically take?

review.title: Review Your Service Offer
review.description: Please review all details before publishing your service

success.servicePostedDescription: Your service has been published and customers can now book it.

errors.locationRequired: Please add an address in your profile first
errors.basePriceRequired: Base price is required for fixed pricing
errors.hourlyRateRequired: Hourly rate is required for hourly pricing
errors.minimumBookingGreaterThanZero: Minimum booking hours must be greater than 0
errors.notLoggedIn: Please log in to create a service
errors.customersCannotPost: Customers cannot create services. Please switch to tasker account.

tips.title: Tips for a Great Service Offer
tips.tip1: Be specific about what you offer and your experience
tips.tip2: Set competitive pricing based on market rates
tips.tip3: Include clear descriptions of what's included
tips.tip4: Add extra services to increase your earning potential

taskerOffer.title: Service Offer
taskerOffer.loginRequired: Please log in to book services
taskerOffer.taskersCannotBook: Taskers cannot book services. Please switch to customer account.
taskerOffer.failedToLoad: Failed to load the service offer. Please try again later.

bookingDialog.title: Confirm Booking
bookingDialog.description: Review your booking details and confirm your service request
bookingDialog.addAddressFirst: Please add an address to your profile first.
bookingDialog.specialRequirementsPlaceholder: Any special instructions or requirements for the service...

contactDialog.title: Contact Tasker
contactDialog.description: Start a conversation with {taskerName} about this service
contactDialog.messagePlaceholder: Hi! I'm interested in your service. Could you tell me more about...
contactDialog.warningMessage: Discussing unrelated topics or sharing contact information may result in a ban of your account. All transactions and contact regarding this service must be handled through ManzelHelp.

tips.tip1: Be specific about your needs and requirements
tips.tip2: Ask about availability and pricing details
tips.tip3: Mention your preferred timeline if you have one
tips.tip4: Be polite and professional in your communication
tips.warning: Sharing contact information or discussing unrelated topics may result in account suspension.

errors.enterMessage: Please enter a message to start the conversation
errors.messageTooShort: Message must be at least 10 characters long
errors.messageTooLong: Message must be less than 500 characters

taskerOffer.ownServiceDescription: You cannot book or contact yourself for this service. This is your own service listing.
taskerOffer.bookingExists: You have an active booking for this service
taskerOffer.conversationExists: You have an ongoing conversation with this tasker

customerBookings.title: My Bookings
customerBookings.description: Track and manage all your service bookings in one place

cancel.title: Cancel Booking
cancel.description: Are you sure you want to cancel this booking with {taskerName}? This action cannot be undone.

bookingDetails.title: Booking Details
bookingDetails.completed: This booking has been completed successfully.
bookingDetails.waitingForTasker: Waiting for the tasker to respond to your booking request.
bookingDetails.taskerAccepted: Great! The tasker has accepted your booking request.
bookingDetails.bookingConfirmed: Your booking is confirmed! The tasker will start the service at the scheduled time.
bookingDetails.taskerWorking: The tasker is currently working on your service.
bookingDetails.pleaseWait: Please wait while we fetch your booking details...
bookingDetails.bookingNotFound: The booking you're looking for doesn't exist or you don't have permission to view it.

accept.title: Accept Booking Request
accept.description: Are you sure you want to accept this booking request? This will notify the customer that you're available to perform the service.

decline.title: Decline Booking Request
decline.description: Are you sure you want to decline this booking request? This action cannot be undone and the customer will be notified.

confirm.title: Confirm Booking
confirm.description: Are you sure you want to confirm this booking? This will finalize the arrangement and notify the customer.

start.title: Start Task
start.description: Are you ready to start the task? This will notify the customer that work has begun.

complete.title: Complete Task
complete.description: Are you sure you want to mark this task as completed? This will finalize the booking and notify the customer.

cancel.title: Cancel Booking
cancel.description: Are you sure you want to cancel this booking? This action cannot be undone and may affect your rating.

cancelCustomer.title: Cancel Booking
cancelCustomer.description: Are you sure you want to cancel this booking? This action cannot be undone and may affect your booking history.

finance.title: Finance Overview
finance.subtitle: Track your payments and manage your spending

transactionHistory.title: Transaction History
transactionHistory.subtitle: Your latest payment activity
transactionHistory.noTransactionsDescription: Your transaction history will appear here once you start booking services.

errors.loadFailed: Failed to load finance data. Please try again.
errors.loginRequired: Please log in to view your finance information.

loading.title: Loading conversation
loading.description: Please wait while we load your messages

empty.title: No messages yet
empty.description: Start the conversation by sending a message

errors.unauthorizedAccess: You don't have permission to view this conversation
